about.intro: I'm Ricardo Camilo, a frontend developer specialized in turning complex challenges into elegant and efficient solutions. üöÄ
about.description: As a developer with an investigative profile (93%), I have a proven track record of performance optimization, achieving improvements of up to 40% in loading time. My analytical and methodical approach ensures clean, maintainable, and scalable code, always following the best market practices. ‚ú®
about.education: Graduated in Information Technology Management from FATEC, with a specialization in modern frontend development. Proficient in Vue.js and React.js, having implemented robust solutions for fintechs and investment platforms. Available for immediate start. üíª
about.hobbies: When I'm not coding, you can find me immersed in Chinese novels, manga, or accompanied by my five cats, seeking inspiration to bring even more creativity to my projects. üìöüê±
about.bruceQuote: "Do not get set into one form, adapt it and build your own, and let it grow, be like water. Empty your mind, be formless, shapeless ‚Äî like water. Now you put water in a cup, it becomes the cup; You put water into a bottle it becomes the bottle; You put it in a teapot it becomes the teapot. Now water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend." - Bruce Lee üåä

bitOfMe.reading: I am an avid reader of Chinese novels and manga, diving into fantastic worlds that expand my creativity.
bitOfMe.movies: Passionate about science fiction, I find inspiration for innovation through movies and series that explore the limits of technology and imagination.
bitOfMe.cats: I have five cats: Hercules, Johan, Lady, Princesa, and Aladin. Each with their unique personality, bringing joy and companionship to my daily life.
bitOfMe.programming: As a developer, I find in programming a way to create digital experiences as fascinating as the stories I read.
bitOfMe.relaxing: In my spare time, I enjoy relaxing with my cats, a good Chinese novel, and a cup of coffee, balancing the technical world with moments of tranquility.
bitOfMe.gaming: An appreciator of well-constructed narratives, whether in books, manga, or games, always seeking stories that inspire me both personally and professionally.

journey.title: Impact & Results
journey.description: Frontend Developer with a proven track record of high-impact deliveries in S√£o Paulo. Specialized in modern architectures and component-oriented development, with experience in fintech and investment platforms.
journey.approach: My methodology ensures measurable results: average reduction of 40% in loading time, implementation of CI/CD for safer deploys, and development of reusable components that accelerate development time by up to 60%.

funFact.label: Availability:
funFact.description: I am available for immediate start and seeking an opportunity to add value with my technical skills and commitment to excellence. Currently expanding knowledge in Node.js for full-stack development.

journey.conclusion: I believe the true value of a developer lies not only in the code I write but in the ability to become elegant and easy to maintain.

work.title: Solutions & Results
work.description: Selected portfolio showcasing technical solutions with measurable business impact.

breathNatural.name: ü™¥ Breath Natural - NextJS
breathNatural.description: My first dive into the NextJS universe! I developed this plant e-commerce with a focus on sustainability, turning a minimalist design into an engaging and modern shopping experience. Even though it was my first project with NextJS, I managed to implement advanced features like SSR (Server-Side Rendering), automatic image optimization, and dynamic routes. The result is an application with exceptional performance, achieving 90+ on Lighthouse, with smooth animations and a premium user experience. This project demonstrates my ability to quickly master new technologies and deliver professional results even during the learning curve.

foodHut.name: üçΩÔ∏è Food Hut - AngularJS
foodHut.description: My journey of discovery in the Angular ecosystem! This food ordering system represents my first dive into the framework, where I turned challenges into learning opportunities. I implemented robust features like a dynamic shopping cart, real-time search system, and state management with Services. Even though it was my first experience with Angular, the project demonstrates mastery of fundamental concepts like Dependency Injection, Observables, and Component Lifecycle. The result is a professional application that not only works flawlessly but also demonstrates my adaptability and rapid evolution in new technologies.

testimonial1.name: Ricardo Camilo
testimonial1.testimonial: Specialist in web performance optimization, with a track record of 40% reduction in loading time. I implement behavioral analysis tools for data-driven decisions, resulting in a better user experience and higher conversion rates.

testimonial2.name: Ricardo Camilo
testimonial2.testimonial: Need to refactor your project or update your system? With expertise in Vue.js and React.js, I can modernize your application while maintaining stability. Specialized in performance optimization and SEO, I can also customize your e-commerce to maximize conversions. My experience includes implementing payment systems, product management, and API integrations."

testimonial3.name: Ricardo Camilo
testimonial3.testimonial: Let me help with your admin panel! I stay up to date with the latest technologies to deliver modern and efficient solutions. I can optimize your existing site, implement responsive design, and improve the user experience. Specialized in creating intuitive dashboards, management systems, and interfaces that truly drive your business."
